links.*: J.R.R. Tolkien: Author of the Century

wikitext.*:
Dr. '''Charles W.R.D. Moseley''' is a Fellow and Tutor of Hughes Hall and has taught Classics and English Literature at the [[Cambridge|University of Cambridge]].
